description: I give permission for external drive but it doesn't see it!

went through 100s of directories in a few seconds.
found over 5000 duplicates, deleted the duplicates.
easy to figure out, speedy.
NOTE: I had to enable some settings in the app settings in Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS to allow access to folders on my virtual disks.
I couldn't select the path I wanted, direct input wasn't possible. By the way, the most terrible path selection ever experienced.
